review: Good Stuff just wish it had Crunchyroll
author: DustinChurch

review: The Amazon Fire Stick has met and exceeded my expectations thus far!
author: Nich

review: Bought it used it one time now I can't get the kids off it, easy to use lots of options and everyone loves the remote
author: Karen G

review: Travel with work a lot and this is great;  simple to store, setup and use.  plenty of TV and movie apps for those who want more than the standard ones (Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, etc.) I use to stream my Slingbox 500 from home to wherever I am.
author: Brian Phillips

review: It works great no issues and delivered on time.
author: James Schimmels

review: Our nephew is our electronics and technology advisor. He suggested that we purchase the Amazon Fire TV Stick. It was an easy set-up. We became Amazon Prime members, downloaded Netflix, HBO Go, and a couple other APPS. Once everything was downloaded, it was like having the keys to the vaults of the Movie and Television studios and having access to endless movies and shows. It is absolutely AWESOME! We are very pleased!
author: Sue
